title: Bug with friends being in game
body: When I was looking through my friends it showed that some of them had been in game for hundreds of minutes, not sure if this is the right place to post this but I hope some Riot employee sees this and can fix c: thanks.

replies.body: Maybe they're having the MOST EPIC GAME EVER? No?  Thanks for the heads up, we've got this noted!

On the actual League Client, when I am in game, my friends said that it shows that I have been in game for hundreds of minutes as well. Not sure if its because I have the app or what but my friends and I haven't seen anyone else being in game hundreds of minutes. Hope this can be fixed c:
Hehe, actually thought about that for the first friend but when I saw they all were I was like nah.
